headline: Steve Madden down 9% as Jefferies downgrades stock on wholesale headwinds
summary: Investing.com -- Steve Madden shares were down 9% on Thursday. Jefferies has downgraded the stock to Underperform and cut its price target to $30, warning that ongoing pressures in the company’s wholesale business could weigh on revenue and margins for multiple quarters.
